alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:17PM CST until March 05 at 7:53AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... St. Francis River near Patterson. .Runoff from recent heavy rain has forced the St. Francis at Patterson above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Francis River near Patterson. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
